entityname.RaftWooden_small_ltt:
Wooden Raft
Click to place the Wooden Raft , made by martin1990. This wooden raft will be used by every non-tundra penguin in the penguin pack!

cell.color:
The wooden raft consists of a small size platform made of wood. They are most commonly seen floating in water in penguin exhibits.
This item is most popular with penguins who like to climb or float around on wooden raft. Penguins from non-Antarctic regions will especially love this raft as an alternative to the ice floe.
